name: Magical Musketeer Starfire
text: You can activate "Magibullet" Spells/Traps from your hand during either player's turn. If a Spell/Trap is activated in the same column as this card: You can Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower "Magibullet" monster from your Deck in Defense Position, except "Magibullet Shooter Star". You can only use this effect of "Magibullet Shooter Star" once per turn.
